meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> carries a <radical>husband</radical> and his <radical>husband</radical> up into the <radical>sun</radical>, where they're going to <kanji>conceal</kanji> something.
readingMnemonic: The husbands are going to <kanji>conceal</kanji> their pet <reading>cen</reading>taur (せん) in the sun. The local government isn’t too pleased that they have a pet centaur so they have to conceal it in the sun so it doesn't get confiscated.
